languages.text: "Изгой Ирлиэт столь же подвержена чувствам, как и вы, мон-кай. Не потому ли она сошла с указанной ей дороги — за годы странствий ее кровь {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Азуриани{/g} истончилась и стала ближе к вашей. Говори же, если тебе есть что сказать".

traits.locale_text: "Изгой Ирлиэт столь же подвержена чувствам, как и вы, мон-кай. Не потому ли она сошла с указанной ей дороги — за годы странствий ее кровь Асурьян истончилась и стала ближе к вашей. Говори же, если тебе есть что сказать".

languages.text: "Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."
languages.original_text: "Изгой Ирлиэт столь же подвержена чувствам, как и вы, мон-кай. Не потому ли она сошла с указанной ей дороги — за годы странствий ее кровь {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Азуриани{/g} истончилась и стала ближе к вашей. Говори же, если тебе есть что сказать".

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her Asuryani blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

"Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her Asuryani blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

"Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her Asuryani blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

"Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

languages.text: “流浪者伊莉耶特已经变得和你们这些猴子一样。你们都受制于自己的情感，这不正是她放弃她真正道途的原因吗？经过了这么多年的流浪，她身为{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}的血脉已经逐渐干涸，变得与你们更为相似。如果你真的有什么话要说，那就说吧。”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

traits.locale_text: “流浪者伊莉耶特已经变得和你们这些猴子一样。你们都受制于自己的情感，这不正是她放弃她真正道途的原因吗？经过了这么多年的流浪，她身为{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}的血脉已经逐渐干涸，变得与你们更为相似。如果你真的有什么话要说，那就说吧。”

languages.text: 「追放者ユリエットは、お前たちモン＝ケイと同等の喜怒哀楽を持つ。彼奴は歩むべき真の道を捨ててきたのではない。何年もの放浪を経て{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}の血を使い果たし、モン＝ケイに近づいたのだ。言いたいことがあるなら言ってみよ」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

traits.locale_text: 「追放者ユリエットは、お前たちモン＝ケイと同等の喜怒哀楽を持つ。彼奴は歩むべき真の道を捨ててきたのではない。何年もの放浪を経て{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}の血を使い果たし、モン＝ケイに近づいたのだ。言いたいことがあるなら言ってみよ」

languages.text: "Yrliet, die Ausgestoßene, ist ihren Gefühlen ebenso verbunden wie Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey. Deshalb hat sie ihren wahren Pfad verlassen – und nach Jahren der Wanderschaft ist ihr {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}-Blut ausgetrocknet und ähnelt nun mehr dem Euren. So sprecht denn, wenn Ihr etwas zu sagen habt."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, die Ausgestoßene, ist ihren Gefühlen ebenso verbunden wie Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey. Deshalb hat sie ihren wahren Pfad verlassen – und nach Jahren der Wanderschaft ist ihr{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g}-Blut ausgetrocknet und ähnelt nun mehr dem Euren. So sprecht denn, wenn Ihr etwas zu sagen habt."

languages.text: « Yrliet l'Errante est l'esclave de ses émotions au même titre que les mon-keigh. N'est-ce pas pour cette raison qu'elle a abandonné sa véritable Voie ? Et après des années d'errance, son sang {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}asuryani{/g} a tari et s'est assimilé au vôtre. Eh bien, parlez, si vous avez quelque chose à dire. »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet l'Errante est l'esclave de ses émotions au même titre que les mon-keigh. N'est-ce pas pour cette raison qu'elle a abandonné sa véritable Voie ? Et après des années d'errance, son sang {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}asuryani{/g} a tari et s'est assimilé au vôtre. Eh bien, parlez, si vous avez quelque chose à dire. »

languages.text: «La proscrita Yrliet es tan prisionera de sus emociones como los mon-keigh. ¿No es ese el motivo por el que abandonó su auténtica Senda? Y, tras años deambulando, su sangre {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}asuryani{/g} se ha secado para volverse más como la vuestra. Habla, pues, si tienes algo que decir».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

traits.locale_text: «La proscrita Yrliet es tan prisionera de sus emociones como los mon-keigh. ¿No es ese el motivo por el que abandonó su auténtica Senda? Y, tras años deambulando, su sangre {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}asuryani{/g} se ha secado para volverse más como la vuestra. Habla, pues, si tienes algo que decir».

languages.text: "Yurtsuz Yrliet de mon-keighler gibi duygularına yenik düşmeye meyilli. Zaten doğru yolundan da bu yüzden dönmedi mi? Yıllarca amaçsız gezindikten sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} kanı da kurumuş, sizinkine benzemiş. Madem anlatacakların var, konuş o hâlde."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet the Outcast is as beholden to her emotions as you mon-keigh are. Isn't that why she abandoned her true path — and after years of wandering, her {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} blood has run dry and become more like yours. Speak then, if you have something to say."

traits.locale_text: "Yurtsuz Yrliet de mon-keighler gibi duygularına yenik düşmeye meyilli. Zaten doğru yolundan da bu yüzden dönmedi mi? Yıllarca amaçsız gezindikten sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} kanı da kurumuş, sizinkine benzemiş. Madem anlatacakların var, konuş o hâlde."
